content: When the area is clear, collect the green Wisps and open the chest to collect Fine Gold Thread and Blood of the Iron Bull.Now approach the cart. This is one of the Five Element Carts, but it's already been dealt with. Get close to its mouth and pull the string when prompted. When you do, you'll hear the voice of Ma Tianba (the horse guai from previous chapters) coming from inside. Keep pulling the string until you've exhausted all dialogue, and then move on. There's nothing more you can do here for now, but we'll return later.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Furnace_Valley_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Furnace Valley Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Valley Entrance' and the sub-subsection 'A Note on Flamlings'.
The content is as follows:
When the area is clear, collect the green Wisps and open the chest to collect Fine Gold Thread and Blood of the Iron Bull.Now approach the cart. This is one of the Five Element Carts, but it's already been dealt with. Get close to its mouth and pull the string when prompted. When you do, you'll hear the voice of Ma Tianba (the horse guai from previous chapters) coming from inside. Keep pulling the string until you've exhausted all dialogue, and then move on. There's nothing more you can do here for now, but we'll return later.
